job_description:
Company: DataSystems
Position: Backend Software Engineer
Location: Austin, TX (Remote)
Salary: $130,000 - $160,000

About Us:
DataSystems is a leading provider of enterprise data management solutions. We empower businesses to make data-driven decisions. We are committed to innovation and providing our clients with the best possible service.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Backend Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our backend systems. The ideal candidate will have experience with Java and Spring.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement RESTful APIs
- Develop and maintain backend services
- Write unit and integration tests
- Troubleshoot and debug production issues

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 3+ years of experience in backend development
- Proficient in Java
- Experience with Spring framework

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
- Experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL)

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Flexible work arrangements
- Opportunity to work on challenging and rewarding projects
